description: Highlights the potential danger from bacteria if frozen food is incorrectly handled. The key is to maintain strict temperature control. Covers all aspects from the handling of fresh food by the processor through freezing, storage transportation in refrigerated containers or trucks, handling by supermarkets and other sales outlets, transportation by the consumer and handling in the home. Suitabvle for middle and upper secondary levels.
